page.title: 18 DO WE NEED A BY-PASS?
page.content: I think we do need a by-pass in Ash because of all the lorries knocking down the reflector posts and going on the pavements.Last week a lorry drove on the pavement and broke a man-hole cover.In 1972,13 years,ago the gate pillars by the church were knocked down by a lorry.A few weeks ago,a lorry and a bus got jammed in the road and there was a huge traffic jam,and it took about 40 minutes to clear. In the street there are many houses up for sale because of all the exhaust fumes and noise from the lorries. Many of the lorries that go through Ash are coal lorries carrying shale,some carry fruit and vegetables,some are very long car-transporters going to and from the car depot at Sandwich. The Street is very narrow and has many old houses.It would be a very pleasant place to live & shop if we had a bypass
